mapper.insert: insert into website_upload_detail (fileid, filename, fileupdate, filepath, fileuploader, isdelete, filedesc, filetype) values (#{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileupdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileuploader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{filedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filetype,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update website_upload_detail set filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileupdate = #{fileupdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileuploader = #{fileuploader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, filedesc = #{filedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=CHAR} where fileid = #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fileid, filename, fileupdate, filepath, fileuploader, isdelete, filedesc, filetype from website_upload_detail
